title: About
content:
“My formula for greatness in a human being is amor fati: that one wants nothing to be different, not forward, not backward, not in all eternity. Not merely bear what is necessary, still less conceal it—all idealism is mendacity in the face of what is necessary—but love it.” – Friedrich Nietzsche

Research

  • Stereo V-SLAM
    • IEEE Publications
      • Evaluation of ORB-SLAM based Stereo Vision for the Aircraft Landing Status Detection on 2022 IECON
  • Embedded Operating System
    • Built An Embedded System Development for Field Workers Safety Detection based on FreeRTOS

Programming

  • C++
  • C
  • Python
  • Matlab

Bio

  • Now
    Studying master’s degree at NCKU dept. of Aeronautics and Astronautics （國立成功大學航空太空工程研究所）
  • 2021
    Graduated from NCKU dept. of Aeronautics and Astronautics（國立成功大學航空太空工程學系）
  • 2017
    Graduated from National Tainan Girls’ Senior High School（國立臺南女子高級中學）
  • 1999
    Born in Tainan, Taiwan（臺灣臺南市）

Hobbies

Music, art, reading and writing. Recently diving into Neovim. Check out my drawings and sound tracks!
